page.title: 04THE WAY WE ARE IN ABERDEEN.
page.content: Fashions are similar to other areas.Fashions change seasonally and yearly.Flares,donkey-jackets,wedge shoes and bowl hair-cuts are OUT. The pop groups we like are also much the same. We all like the type of groups that get to number 1 in the record charts.The main things pop reco rds have in common is a good rhythm, a good tune and good words that fit in with the tune. Children enjoy playing games and watcing T.V. Parents usually read the paper or watch T.V.or go out to a club,dance,cinema,pub,restaurant or to friends.At weekends families go for a run in the car,watch sports,go shopping,help in the house and relax. People eat the same foods as we do but,we eat different things every day. On Sundays we have a special three- course meal of chicken or roast beef.
